Header: Those who insult on social media are being monitored
Content: The Sri Lanka Information Technology Association says that there is a tendency for social media websites to exchange slanderous / fake news and hate statements based on presidential elections to affect the privacy and rights of others. The Association states that this has been revealed by the studies carried out by its association. The Association points out that such content is posted on social media websites using fake social media accounts. Creating fake accounts, publishing fake news and hate statements is contrary to the community guidelines of social media websites. The Sri Lanka Information Technology Society further stated that the social media website has provided users with the facility of removing such fake accounts from their social media sites. The Association calls on the public to report if they come across any hate or fake news on social media.
